alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 10:35AM EDT until April 09 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Alabama... Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, considerable flooding of lowlands occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:05 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 17.1 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
